plugins.name: tabz
plugins.description: Browser automation via 70 MCP tools - screenshots, clicks, forms, tabs, TTS, history, cookies, emulation, notifications. Core TabzChrome browser control.

plugins.name: conductor
plugins.description: Multi-session orchestration, parallel workers, code review, and issue management. For complex multi-step workflows.

plugins.name: state-tracker
plugins.description: Live session state tracking hooks - enables TabzChrome terminal updates and audio notifications.

plugins.name: xterm-js
plugins.description: Best practices for xterm.js terminal implementations, React integration, WebSocket communication, and debugging. For building terminal applications.

plugins.name: ctthandoff
plugins.description: Generate handoff summaries, copy to clipboard, and speak via TTS. For session transitions.

plugins.name: page-reader
plugins.description: Capture and summarize web pages, read aloud via TTS. For content consumption.

plugins.name: codexforclaude
plugins.description: OpenAI Codex CLI configuration guide - config.toml, sandbox policies, approval modes, MCP servers, model settings. For Codex users.
